Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: A sweeping review of the Reserve Bank of Australia is stirring things up and making some people restless. The review recommends establishing a separate monetary policy board diversifying the bank's board increasing transparency and communication and more. The overhaul aims to position Reserve Bank for future success in an ever-changing economy. Treasurer Jim Chalmers has accepted all 51 recommendations and emphasized the importance of keeping the Reserve Bank independent and unaffected by politics. The world is waiting to see how the changes will play out.
